Setting the Report Order in a Booklet

Once you have added reports to a Booklet, you can modify the order in which the reports will appear. Click on a report that has been added to the Booklet structure to highlight it, and then use the Up/Down arrow buttons to move the report forward or backward in the report sequence. To move a report all the way to either the top or the bottom of a booklet, click on the TOP / BOTTOM button with the desired report highlighted.
